message.body: Do not tell him I told you, wait for him to if he hasn't already, but my car got booted at school... I hope he's "taking care of" my car because it doesn't seem like it
Does this stuff go on my record since the car's under my name?
Do you mean the car got kicked again?
No, like metal boots on the wheels like from the police
What does that mean? He was parked too long in one spot?
I don't know, I just saw a tweet about it
I'll figure it out. Ugh. I saw your picture on Facebook. Is that Scott?
Yea, he looks goofy in the picture
I miss you. I miss hearing your voice too
I miss you too. I want to be home
